contact.title: Let’s Talk
contact.subtitle: I’m excited to collaborate on innovative projects or discuss your next idea. Reach out via email or LinkedIn.
contact.cta: Feel free to reach out if you're interested in collaborating. I'm always open to new opportunities and challenges.
faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about my profile, experience, and availability.
faq.q1.q: What roles am I currently looking for?
faq.q1.a: Junior roles related to Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, and web/data-oriented development, where data supports decision-making and real product or business impact.
faq.q2.q: What type of position am I looking for?
faq.q2.a: Ideally a full-time junior position with responsibility, mentorship, and room to grow. I prefer to focus on professional work in a company rather than purely academic programs.
faq.q3.a: I’m available to start soon. If you need a specific start date, feel free to reach out and we can align.
faq.q4.q: What work arrangement do I prefer?
faq.q4.a: Preferably remote work, as it helps with focus and time management. I’m also open to hybrid arrangements depending on the team and project context.
faq.q5.q: What technologies do I work with?
faq.q5.a: My main stack includes Python and SQL, plus web development with modern tooling. I’m also building hands-on experience with cloud (Azure) and data tools for processing and visualization.
faq.q6.a: Yes. During my internship at DEKRA Digital & Product Solutions, I worked in a production environment, contributing to full-stack features and collaborating in an agile team.
faq.q7.q: What is my most relevant project?
faq.q7.a: My Final Degree Project: a browser-based tool that extracts, processes, and visualizes Moodle course data, generating dashboards and exportable analytical reports.
faq.q8.q: How do I approach communication and teamwork?
faq.q8.a: I prioritize clear, structured communication and proactive collaboration. I like aligning early on goals, asking the right questions, and sharing progress to keep the team moving smoothly.
faq.q9.a: I have a B2 level of English (Cambridge B2 First). I’m comfortable reading technical documentation and communicating in international contexts.
faq.q10.a: I usually respond within 24–48 hours via email or LinkedIn.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.subtitle: A simple, structured workflow I use to learn, align goals, and deliver value.
approach.steps.1.title: Understand
approach.steps.1.desc: Clarify goals, context, constraints, and what “success” looks like.
approach.steps.2.title: Plan
approach.steps.2.desc: Define data sources, metrics, scope, and a realistic delivery path with the team.
approach.steps.3.title: Build
approach.steps.3.desc: Implement analysis, pipelines, dashboards, or features following clean code practices.
approach.steps.4.title: Validate
approach.steps.4.desc: Check correctness, edge cases, and performance, incorporating feedback and reviews.
approach.steps.5.title: Deliver
approach.steps.5.desc: Document work, hand off clearly, and iterate based on feedback.

experience.timeline.title: Experience Timeline
experience.items.paper.title: Research Paper (In Progress)
experience.items.paper.subtitle: Scientific article based on my Final Degree Project
experience.items.paper.desc: Currently collaborating on the preparation of a scientific article based on my Final Degree Project, with the goal of submitting it to a journal or conference focused on educational technology and data analysis.
experience.items.mda.title: Moodle Data Analyzer
experience.items.mda.subtitle: University of Málaga · Final Degree Project
experience.items.mda.desc: Design and development of a browser-based data analysis tool for extracting, processing, and visualizing Moodle academic data to support data-driven decision-making. Built interactive dashboards with strong focus on data storytelling, and generated exportable analytical reports (PDF, CSV, DOCX).
experience.items.dekra.title: DEKRA Digital & Product Solutions
experience.items.dekra.subtitle: Internship
experience.items.dekra.desc: Developed and maintained full-stack web features for a cybersecurity platform, working with Django, Angular, and PostgreSQL in a production environment. Implemented backend logic and integrated frontend components, improving the consistency and functionality of multiple application modules. Participated in deployment and environment management using Docker, enabling a more stable and reproducible development process. Collaborated in an agile working environment, using Jira for task planning and GitLab for version control and code integration. Actively contributed to production code, gaining hands-on professional experience and strengthening teamwork skills.
experience.items.degree.title: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science Engineering
experience.items.degree.subtitle: University of Málaga · Specialization in Information Systems
experience.items.degree.desc: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering from the University of Málaga, with a specialization in Information Systems and an education focused on data analysis and information management to support decision-making. Acquired a solid foundation in programming, databases, mathematics, and statistics, as well as in the design and analysis of information systems, developing a structured view of the data lifecycle. Progressive specialization in data analysis and Business Intelligence, working with Python, SQL, Power BI, and cloud environments. Applied these skills in academic projects and industry internships, strengthening teamwork and technical communication.
experience.items.bach.title: Technological Baccalaureate
experience.items.bach.subtitle: IES Torre Almirante
experience.items.bach.desc: Technological Baccalaureate focused on logical thinking, academic mathematics, and structured problem solving, serving as the foundation of my subsequent technical education. This stage strengthened analytical reasoning skills and provided a solid base for further studies in computer science engineering.
experience.research.title: Research Paper
experience.research.desc: I am currently collaborating on the preparation of a scientific article based on my Final Degree Project, with the goal of submitting it to a journal or conference focused on educational technology and data analysis.
projects.moodle.title: Moodle Data Analyzer
projects.moodle.desc.short: Browser-based data analysis tool that extracts, processes, and visualizes academic data from Moodle, transforming raw data into actionable insights and analytical dashboards.
projects.moodle.desc.long: Design and development of a browser-based data analysis tool for the extraction, processing, and visualization of academic data from Moodle, aimed at supporting data-driven decision-making in educational contexts. Application of data extraction techniques, analytical processing, and analysis workflows to transform raw data into structured information and interactive dashboards. Generation of exportable analytical reports in PDF, CSV, and DOCX formats, enabling clear interpretation and practical use of results. Strong focus on data visualization and storytelling to clearly communicate usage patterns, participation, and academic performance. Use of React, Webpack, Chart.js, TailwindCSS, Docker, and agile methodologies in the development of the solution. Preparation of a scientific article currently in progress, reinforcing the analytical relevance and practical impact of the project in the field of educational analytics.
projects.portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Website

reviews.title: Professional Feedback
reviews.subtitle: A couple of words from supervisors and mentors who followed my work in real projects.
reviews.uma.quote: My sincerest congratulations on such a well-crafted project you’ve developed, achieving an excellent grade you truly deserve. Wishing you all the best in this new stage—and what a great way to start it by turning that work into a strong scientific article.
reviews.uma.role: Professor & AI Researcher · University of Málaga
reviews.dekra.quote: Thank you, Raúl! We were impressed by how quickly you adapted to the project—contributing from day one and delivering top-level features. It was a pleasure having you on the team. You have a professional career full of success ahead.
